text: Sheriff Callie's Wild West is an American CGI-animated children's television series created by George Evelyn, Holly Huckins, and Denis Morella, the creators of Higglytown Heroes, for Disney Junior. The Theme song is sung by Mandy Moore. ==Overview== The series borrows elements from the Western genre, with the theme of the series revolving around "getting along with each other." Category:American children's television series
title: Sheriff Callie's Wild West
